programme.title: Dick Tracy
programme.desc: Warren Beatty stars as a tough detective with a soft heart and a huge appetite for adventure. He faces the most picturesque gangsters ever to release crime on the streets of his city(n)

programme.title: Inside Man
programme.desc: Detective Frazier (Academy Award winner Denzel Washington) is a tough cop who matches wits with a clever bank robber named Dalton (Academy Award nominee Clive Owen). As the dangerous cat-and-mouse game unfolds, a wild card emerges: Madaline (Academy Award winner Jodie Foster), a power broker with a hidden agenda. Directed by Spike Lee(n)

programme.title: Mayweather vs. McGregor - Episode 1
programme.desc: In the latest installment of ALL ACCESS, SHOWTIME SPORTS takes you inside the spectacle behind the most anticipated sporting event of the year as legendary undefeated world champion Floyd Mayweather prepares to battle UFC superstar Conor McGregor in an epic match for the ages(n)

programme.title: Mayweather vs. McGregor - Episode 2
programme.desc: In the latest installment of ALL ACCESS, SHOWTIME SPORTS takes you inside the spectacle behind the most anticipated sporting event of the year as legendary undefeated world champion Floyd Mayweather prepares to battle UFC superstar Conor McGregor in an epic match for the ages(n)

programme.title: Mayweather vs. McGregor - Episode 3
programme.desc: In the latest installment of ALL ACCESS, SHOWTIME SPORTS takes you inside the spectacle behind the most anticipated sporting event of the year as legendary undefeated world champion Floyd Mayweather prepares to battle UFC superstar Conor McGregor in an epic match for the ages(n)

programme.title: Mayweather vs. McGregor - Episode 4
programme.desc: In the latest installment of ALL ACCESS, SHOWTIME SPORTS takes you inside the spectacle behind the most anticipated sporting event of the year as legendary undefeated world champion Floyd Mayweather prepares to battle UFC superstar Conor McGregor in an epic match for the ages(n)

programme.title: Office Christmas Party
programme.desc: When the CEO (Jennifer Aniston) of a company tries to close her hard-partying brother's branch, he (T.J. Miller) and his CTO (Jason Bateman) must rally their co-workers and host an epic office Christmas party in an effort to impress a potential client and close a sale that will save their jobs. Also stars Olivia Munn, Vanessa Bayer, Courtney B. Vance, Rob Corddry and Kate McKinnon(n)

programme.title: Con Air
programme.desc: America's most hardened and dangerous criminals are transported via Con Air, a customized armored aircraft equipped with armed guards, hand and leg shackles, and top secret destinations. No one has ever escaped from one of these flying fortresses. A group of violent and deadly cons seizes control of one of the planes, taking the guards hostage and setting a course out of the country. Poe, an inmate who has done his time and is being shipped home to be reunited with his family, proves to be a fly in their ointment(n)

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
programme.desc: Tristan (Brad Pitt), Alfred (Aidan Quinn) and Samuel (Henry Thomas) are the sons of proud Col. William Ludlow (Anthony Hopkins). They become brothers torn apart after a beautiful woman (Julia Ormond) captures their hearts, setting into motion a tragic series of events involving territorial politics, World War I, Prohibition and the Native American struggle. Directed by Ed Zwick(n)

programme.title: The Gift
programme.desc: Psychological thriller starring Jason Bateman and Rebecca Hall as a young married couple whose life is going just as planned until they have a chance encounter with an acquaintance who sends their world into a harrowing tailspin. Co-stars Joel Edgerton(n)

programme.title: What About Bob?
programme.desc: Comedy about a troubled but lovable therapy patient, Bob, who seeks help from a noted psychiatrist to find relief from his crippling fears. But when the psychiatrist goes on a quiet family vacation, Bob unexpectedly shows up at his lakeside retreat and won't leave. Stars Bill Murray and Richard Dreyfuss

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: For two centuries, Andrew, a popular robot model, learns all he might about the intricacies of humanity, life and love, and teaches as much as he learns. Through these efforts, he shows the world how to open its eyes and its heart to receive any being with enough compassion to ask for acceptance

programme.title: Smoke Signals
programme.desc: A stoic young Coeur d'Alene man grudgingly allows his nerdy friend to travel with him from their home on an Idaho reservation to Phoenix, Arizona, in order to settle the affairs of his recently-deceased alcoholic father. Along the way, the truth about a childhood tragedy unites them, along with revelations about what it takes to be a real Native American. Irene Bedard costars

programme.title: Time At The Top
programme.desc: A thirteen-year-old Philadelphia girl (Elisha Cuthbert) from the 20th Century travels through time with a couple of pals (Gabrielle Boni, Matthew Harbour) from the 19th Century in this family adventure with Timothy Busfield and Michael Sinelnikoff

programme.title: De-Lovely
programme.desc: Kevin Kline stars in this acclaimed biography of famed songwriter Cole Porter, whose rise to fame and fortune coincides with his marriage to Linda Thomas (Ashley Judd), a woman who will love him for life despite knowing that her husband is gay. Jonathan Pryce costars in this Golden Globe®-nominated musical drama that also features appearances from several real-life musicians

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship

programme.title: Dick Tracy
programme.desc: Warren Beatty stars as a tough detective with a soft heart and a huge appetite for adventure. He faces the most picturesque gangsters ever to release crime on the streets of his city

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress

programme.title: Bigger Than the Sky
programme.desc: Bored and depressed, a lonely single guy impulsively tries out for a part in a local theater's production of "Cyrano de Bergerac" and lands the lead role. It's an opportunity that leads to a new circle of friends, a new love interest - and a few new problems when his director loses confidence in his acting ability. Marcus Thomas, Amy Smart, John Corbett, Sean Astin and Clare Higgins star in this romantic comedy from actor-turned-director Al Corley

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: Dick Tracy
programme.desc: Warren Beatty stars as a tough detective with a soft heart and a huge appetite for adventure. He faces the most picturesque gangsters ever to release crime on the streets of his city

programme.title: Max Steel
programme.desc: Teenager Max McGrath moves back to Copper Canyon, the town where his scientist father died under mysterious circumstances. Adjusting to a new school is not easy for Max, and it becomes even more complicated when his body starts to generate strange energy flare-ups that he can't control. This unpredictable power surge grows too intense for Max to handle and he is forced to distance himself from those around him. On the brink of fatal combustion, Max is rescued by Steel, an extraterrestrial who has been secretly monitoring his progress

programme.title: Bigger Than the Sky
programme.desc: Bored and depressed, a lonely single guy impulsively tries out for a part in a local theater's production of "Cyrano de Bergerac" and lands the lead role. It's an opportunity that leads to a new circle of friends, a new love interest - and a few new problems when his director loses confidence in his acting ability. Marcus Thomas, Amy Smart, John Corbett, Sean Astin and Clare Higgins star in this romantic comedy from actor-turned-director Al Corley

programme.title: People Like Us
programme.desc: Sam (Chris Pine) is a twenty-something, fast-talking salesman whose latest deal collapses the day he learns his father has suddenly died. Against his wishes, Sam is called home to put his father's estate in order and reconnect with his estranged family. While there, he uncovers a startling secret that turns his entire world upside down - he has a 30-year-old sister (Elizabeth Banks) he never knew existed. Michelle Pfeiffer and Oliva Wilde co-star in this smart and witty drama

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor

programme.title: Weird Science
programme.desc: Two tormented teen-rejects create the perfect woman with their computer, and a little bit of magic. Soon, their willing sex goddess helps them boost their popularity and even the score against the cool cliques at school

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself

programme.title: Drunkboat
programme.desc: A young teenager, Abe (Jacob Zachar), manipulates the unsuspecting help of his alcoholic Uncle Mort (John Malkovich) to buy a boat from a con man named Mr. Fletcher (John Goodman)

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: 65 million years ago, Aladar the iguanodon is separated from his own kind and raised by a clan of lemurs, including the wisecracking Zini and the compassionate Plio. When a meteor shower destroys their home, Aladar and his family follow a herd of dinosaurs heading for the safety of the "nesting grounds." Along the way, Aladar befriends Baylene, an elderly brachiosaur, Eema, an unstoppable styrachosaur, and Neera, a feisty fellow iguanodon. Together, they must stand strong amidst food shortages and threats from predators

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: Babe
programme.desc: Young Babe has no way of knowing how much his world is about to change when his mother is suddenly hauled off in a truck that takes pigs away. Babe then arrives at the farm of Mr. Hoggett and his large and lively wife, Esme. All kinds of species live on the farm, and some of the animals welcome Babe with open paws, while a few resent the friendly little porker. Babe's approach to the barnyard life is different from all the others, and he goes to great lengths to find acceptance

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home(n)

programme.title: Molly Moon and the Incredible Book of Hypnotism
programme.desc: A young orphan girl, Molly Moon, learns hypnotism from a book, catapulting her to fame and wealth in London. But little does she know that there's an unscrupulous bank robber who'll stop at nothing to get her book(n)

programme.title: The Band's Visit
programme.desc: A band comprised of Egyptian Policemen head to Israel to play at the inaugural ceremony of an Arab arts center, only to find themselves lost in the wrong town. This ultimately leads to revelations that cross cultural boundaries(n)

programme.title: Furry Vengeance
programme.desc: A real estate developer (Brendan Fraser) discovers that Mother Nature is sometimes best left unmolested when his attempt to build a massive new subdivision in Oregon is opposed by an army of clever critters led by a raccoon. Brooke Shields and Ken Jeong costar in this family comedy(n)

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the release of ‘Pet Sounds,' Brian Wilson and surviving members of The Beach Boys (Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston and David Marks) revisit the writing and recording of the landmark record that is consistently voted one of the top three influential albums of all time. Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions(n)

programme.title: Dinosaur
programme.desc: 65 million years ago, Aladar the iguanodon is separated from his own kind and raised by a clan of lemurs, including the wisecracking Zini and the compassionate Plio. When a meteor shower destroys their home, Aladar and his family follow a herd of dinosaurs heading for the safety of the "nesting grounds." Along the way, Aladar befriends Baylene, an elderly brachiosaur, Eema, an unstoppable styrachosaur, and Neera, a feisty fellow iguanodon. Together, they must stand strong amidst food shortages and threats from predators(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest. After Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe must go to the big city to save the day. George Miller returns to direct(n)

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: What About Bob?
programme.desc: Comedy about a troubled but lovable therapy patient, Bob, who seeks help from a noted psychiatrist to find relief from his crippling fears. But when the psychiatrist goes on a quiet family vacation, Bob unexpectedly shows up at his lakeside retreat and won't leave. Stars Bill Murray and Richard Dreyfuss(n)

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: A paranormal expert moves into an abandoned house. It's populated by three mischievous ghosts and one friendly one named Casper, who befriends his lonely daughter named Kat. Bill Pullman and Christina Ricci star(n)

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people(n)

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?(n)

programme.title: Babe: Pig in the City
programme.desc: Babe returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest. After Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe must go to the big city to save the day. George Miller returns to direct(n)

programme.title: Gigli
programme.desc: Gigli (Ben Affleck) is ordered to kidnap the psychologically-challenged younger brother of a powerful federal prosecutor. When plans go awry, Gigli's boss sends in Ricki (Jennifer Lopez), a gorgeous free-spirited female gangster who has her own set of orders, to assist with the kidnapping. Gigli begins falling for the decidedly unavailable Ricki, which is a hazard to his occupation

programme.title: Body of Deceit
programme.desc: Alice (Kristanna Loken) is a ghostwriter for a famous author. She is halfway through the work of his new book, but cannot write anymore. A year has passed since she had a terrible accident in Malta where she was staying with her husband Max (Antonio Cupo) in his family villa and was in a coma for two weeks. Since then, she has been suffering from depression and has recurrent and cryptic nightmares. Max persuades her to go back to Malta in the hopes that something will unblock her mind so she can start working again and meet her deadline

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: The Descent
programme.desc: Seeking to exorcise the demons of a tragedy that still haunts her, an outdoorsy woman (Shauna Macdonald) and her five best friends spend a weekend spelunking in the Appalachian Mountains - but a wrong turn down a remote cave system lands them at the doorstep of strange, flesh-craving creatures. Natalie Mendoza, Alex Reid, Saskia Mulder, Nora-Jane Noone, MyAnna Buring, Oliver Milburn and Molly Kayll costar in the sophomore film of writer-director Neil Marshall

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room

programme.title: Gravy
programme.desc: Comic horror flick about a group of employees in a Mexican Cantina who are terrorized by a trio of cannibals, who lock the staff in the restaurant and go on a Halloween night killing spree. Stars Sutton Foster

programme.title: Kelly's Hollywood
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the intimate story of an aspiring actor who brings his sister, born with Down syndrome, out to Los Angeles to pursue her dream of becoming a Hollywood diva. But as her health begins to fail and she becomes increasing jealous of his fiancée, he is forced to confront his co-dependent sibling relationship and the threat it is posing to his engagement

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity

programme.title: More Than T
programme.desc: Beyond the headlines and debates about gender rights witness the multidimensional lives of seven transgender and gender nonconforming individuals as told through the lens of celebrated filmmaker Silas Howard (‘Transparent')

programme.title: Can't Hardly Wait
programme.desc: The graduation ceremony is over at Huntington Hills High, and it's time for the real festivities to begin at the graduation party. Aspiring writer Preston Meyers (Ethan Embry) has been carrying a torch for class knockout Amanda Beckett (Jennifer Love Hewitt) for years. His tormented infatuation culminates at the party, where he seizes the opportunity to declare his love for her after she is dumped by her jock boyfriend (Peter Facinelli). Relationships and friendships are broken and formed

programme.title: Last Weekend
programme.desc: Celia (Patricia Clarkson) is an aging matriarch who wants everyone to gather one last time at her family's gorgeous Lake Tahoe manor and reminisce before she puts it on the market. However, her sons are too preoccupied with their own busy lives and struggling relationships for any nostalgia. The dream of a splendid Labor Day weekend dies quickly in a whirlwind of contention, crisis and family dysfunction. Celia is forced to let go of her fantasy and attend to the harsh reality brought on by a sudden emergency

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: Bang Bang Baby
programme.desc: In this dreamy sci-fi musical set in the 1960s, an isolated small town teenager believes her hopes of becoming a famous singer will come true when her rock star idol gets stranded in town and romance blooms between them but a leak in a nearby chemical plant threatens to turn her dream into a nightmare

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Legendary filmmaker Garry Marshall directs an all-star cast including Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Julia Roberts and Jason Sudeikis in this romantic comedy about a group of strong, loving and wildly imperfect women who are about to prove the power of the maternal bond

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought

programme.title: Can't Hardly Wait
programme.desc: The graduation ceremony is over at Huntington Hills High, and it's time for the real festivities to begin at the graduation party. Aspiring writer Preston Meyers (Ethan Embry) has been carrying a torch for class knockout Amanda Beckett (Jennifer Love Hewitt) for years. His tormented infatuation culminates at the party, where he seizes the opportunity to declare his love for her after she is dumped by her jock boyfriend (Peter Facinelli). Relationships and friendships are broken and formed

programme.title: Tim & Faith: Soul2Soul
programme.desc: Includes live performances from Tim McGraw and Faith Hill's 2017 Soul2Soul world tour, as well as an intimate look inside their relationship. Never before seen interviews are presented along side behind-the-scenes footage, capturing their chemistry on and off the stage. Directed and executive produced by the award-winning team of Dan Cutforth and Jane Lipsitz

programme.title: A Woman, A Part
programme.desc: Maggie Siff stars as Anna Baskin, an exhausted workaholic actress at a crossroads. She abruptly extricates herself from a successful but mind-numbing TV role, returning to a life she left behind with ex-creative partners Kate (Cara Seymour) and Isaac (John Ortiz). Director Elisabeth Subrin examines the media's portrayal of women, the nature of friendship and the difficulties of reckoning with change

programme.title: Last Girl Standing
programme.desc: Five years after surviving a brutal massacre, the lone survivor struggles to reclaim her shattered life. But just when she thinks she might finally be ready to start anew, the past comes back to haunt her

programme.title: Intruders
programme.desc: An agoraphobic woman is isolated from human contact in every way and that is exactly how she likes it. But when a trio of criminals breaks into her old Victorian house on the outskirts of town, they discover there's another side to her psychosis

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: Cupid's Proxy
programme.desc: Rebecca Murphy is a cynical widow whose whole world revolves around her 12 year old son, Justin - a budding musician who can't remember his late father. Rebecca has no desire to date despite efforts by her feisty neighbor, Olive, who has a love advice column called Call Me Cupid. When Olive is pressured by her editor to get with the times, she enlists Justin to help her answer a letter. Unbeknownst to Justin, she publishes his advice under the alter ego, Cupid's Proxy

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world

programme.title: Blackway
programme.desc: Revenge thriller starring Anthony Hopkins as a man haunted by the memory of his daughter's death, who comes to the aid of a young woman who is being viciously harassed by a rogue cop. Co-stars Julia Stiles and Ray Liotta

programme.title: Forces of Nature
programme.desc: Ben (Ben Affleck) has to get from New York to Savannah for his wedding. Everything is under control, until a young woman named Sarah (Sandra Bullock) literally falls into his life. Ben and Sarah's plane goes skidding off the runway and he inadvertently saves Sarah's life, only to find that he has inherited an unlikely travel companion. After being detained, derailed and disrobed, Ben realizes that he's developing a definite attraction to the sexy and impetuous Sarah and the feeling is decidedly mutual

programme.title: Different Flowers
programme.desc: Uptight Millie Haven (Emma Bell) has always followed the rules, but when she has doubts before her big Kansas City wedding, her attitude-prone little sister Emma (Hope Lauren), comes to the rescue. They embark on a spontaneous road trip to their grandmother's farm where, with the help of Grandma Mildred (Shelley Long), they rediscover their bond. They meet a local hunk with a heart of gold, and a host of only-in-the-Midwest characters as they pick up the pieces of Millie's life

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms

programme.title: In the Bedroom
programme.desc: The Fowlers are a typical family in Maine. Matt is the town doctor and loves to fish. His wife, Ruth, is the school's choir leader, and their son, Frank, is home from his first year of college. Frank is in love with Natalie, a mother who isn't quite divorced yet from her husband, Richard. It makes Richard's blood boil to see his wife running around with another man. The affair takes a sudden and tragic turn, and the Fowlers are forced to confront the harsh reality of their situation(n)

programme.title: Mercy (2010)
programme.desc: A writer (Scott Caan) of highly sentimental love stories is secretly a womanizing cynic who has never actually experienced love, until he meets the beautiful and shockingly straightforward critic Mercy (Wendy Glenn), who is not fooled by his phony mawkishness. Erika Christensen costars in this romantic drama(n)

programme.title: TIFFANY HADDISH: SHE READY! From the Hood to Hollywood!
programme.desc: In this hour-long special filmed at the Nate Holden Performing Arts Center, rising comedy star Tiffany Haddish takes the stage in her hometown of Los Angeles to tackle subjects ranging from her early days in foster care and being bullied on the playground, to getting her revenge on ex-boyfriends and introducing Will and Jada Pinkett Smith to Groupon(n)

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Over-worked, over-committed and exhausted, Amy joins forces with two other stressed moms on a quest to liberate themselves from conventional responsibilities - going on a long overdue binge of freedom and fun that puts them on a collision course with the head of the PTA and her clique of perfect moms(n)

programme.title: Return To Me
programme.desc: After he suffers the devastating loss of his beloved wife Elizabeth, a Chicago building contractor (David Duchovny) unknowingly falls in love with the woman (Minnie Driver) who received Elizabeth's transplanted heart. Carroll O'Connor, James Belushi, Robert Loggia, Joely Richardson, David Alan Grier and Bonnie Hunt (who also wrote and directed) costar in this charming romantic comedy-drama(n)

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse(n)

programme.title: Apartment Troubles
programme.desc: Two codependent roommates, on the verge of eviction, flee New York for the promise of sunshine in Los Angeles where their friendship is tested by a chance at fame, a fortune teller and an amorous wealthy aunt. Features Megan Mullally and Jeffrey Tambor(n)

programme.title: London Town
programme.desc: When fifteen-year-old Shay (Daniel Huttlestone) hears the music of The Clash for the first time, it's a revelation, opening up a new world of anti-establishment defiance beyond anything he's known in his dead-end London suburb. Drawn into the heart of the city's burgeoning punk scene, he forges two relationships that will change his life: falling in love with rebellious cool girl Vivian (Nell Williams) and finding an unexpected connection with none other than The Clash's electrifying frontman, Joe Strummer (Jonathan Rhys Meyers)(n)

programme.title: While You Were Sleeping
programme.desc: A lonely Chicago token collector (Sandra Bullock) pines for a handsome commuter (Peter Gallagher). When she saves his life after a mugging that leaves him comatose, she's mistaken for his fiancee. Playing along, she instead falls in love with her "fiancee's" brother (Bill Pullman), thus setting in motion a decidedly bizarre love triangle. Jack Warden, Peter Boyle, Glynis Johns, Michael Rispoli, Ally Walker and Monica Keena costar in this romantic comedy that made Bullock a star(n)

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost(n)

programme.title: High Fidelity
programme.desc: John Cusack stars as Rob Gordon, the owner of a failing record store located on one of the back streets of Chicago. He employs two wacky clerks, the rock snob Barry (Jack Black) and the underachiever Dick (Todd Luiso). Rob's business isn't the only thing in his life that's floundering however, after after his longtime girlfriend Laura (Iben Hjejle) walks out on him. This forces him to examine his past failed attempts at romance(n)

programme.title: The Present With a Future Bette Davis Christmas War Bonds Trailer
programme.desc: Public-service short featuring a well-to-do mother explaining to her children why war bonds make a great holiday gift. Bette Davis, Patti Hale. Directed by Vincent Sherman

programme.title: Christmas in Connecticut
programme.desc: The columnist for a national housekeeping magazine, as part of a promotional stunt, welcomes a returning war hero into her country estate, the only problem is she's a klutz in the kitchen, where she's never been at home on the range. (cc)

programme.title: Remember the Night
programme.desc: A woman is arrested for shoplifting. As they await her trial, the cop who arrests her takes her home to his family for Christmas, where the loving atmosphere changes her outlook and they begin to fall in love. (cc)

programme.title: Star in the Night
programme.desc: Oscar-winning short subject is a modern-day retelling of the Nativity story, set in the American Southwest, where three wandering cowboys stumble upon a man and woman with child in a run-down motel run by a crusty curmudgeon

programme.title: Meet Me in St. Louis
programme.desc: Americana tunefest set against the backdrop of the impending 1904 World's Fair in St. Louis, as a family learn their father's business is transferring him to New York City, and his four daughters argue that they don't want to move. Songs include "The Boy Next Door," "The Trolley Song" and "Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas." (cc)

programme.title: In the Good Old Summertime
programme.desc: Two clerks in a turn-of-the-20th-century Chicago sheet-music store are intensely antagonistic toward each other, but unbeknownst to the two, they actually are getting very chummy as pen pals. A musical remake of "The Shop Around the Corner," in which the setting was changed from a Budapest sundries shop. (cc)

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: Adaptation of Louisa May Alcott's classic slice of Americana about the four spirited March sisters and details their adventures, ambitions and romances in 1860s Massachusetts. (cc)

programme.title: One Foot in Heaven
programme.desc: Best Picture nominee tells the story of a minister and his family, and their joys and sorrows as they move from parish to parish over the years during the early 20th century. The film is an adaptation of Hartzell Spence's biography of his preacher father. (cc)

programme.title: The City of Little Men
programme.desc: Short film examining the history of Boys Town, a home for orphaned, homeless and delinquent lads, founded by Father Edward Flanagan in 1917 Nebraska. Father Flanagan appears as himself. Narrated by Frank Whitbeck and directed by Harry Loud

programme.title: Boys Town
programme.desc: A fact-based portrait of Father Edward J. Flanagan, a crusading priest who built a Nebraska community for orphans and believed that "there's no such thing as a bad boy," although his theory is sorely tested by a punky street tough who learns the hard way about the school's altruistic mission. Spencer Tracy's portrayal of the famous founding father won him his second consecutive Oscar (the first was for "Captains Courageous"). Best Picture nominee. (cc)

programme.title: City of Children
programme.desc: A visit to an orphanage community founded in 1913 in Mooseheart, Ill., where parentless children are taught trades and professions. Narrated by John Nesbitt

programme.title: Ben-Hur
programme.desc: The Biblical epic re-creates the Nativity, the Crucifixion and a thundering chariot race as it recounts the tale of Jewish prince Judah Ben-Hur, who lives in Judea with his family during the time that Jesus Christ was becoming known for his teachings. The film won 11 Oscars, including Best Picture, Actor (Charlton Heston) and Director (William Wyler). (cc)

programme.title: The Song of Bernadette
programme.desc: A peasant girl named Bernadette living in 1858 Lourdes sees a vision of the Virgin Mary, sending her home town into a tumult as corrupt officials fear her influence over the townsfolk. (cc)

programme.title: Miracle at Lourdes
programme.desc: Short drama about a doctor's lame wife who is cured by the healing waters of the site where, in 1858, a young French girl experienced a vision of the Blessed Mother. Narrated by Carey Wilson. Directed by Henry Dunn

programme.title: King of Kings
programme.desc: New Testament epic telling of the life of Jesus Christ, the court of Herod the Great and the political intrigues of Barabbas. (cc)

programme.title: The Quiet Man
programme.desc: A strapping Irish-American boxer (John Wayne) returns to the old sod to forget a tragic event in his prizefighting past and falls in love with the feisty colleen, the sister of a "big, bellowing bully" who hates him for purchasing property he himself had his eye on. (cc)

programme.title: My Favorite Wife

programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: A down-and-out Detroit youth with a dead-end job and an unstable home life pursues a career as a rap artist. Rabbit has just been dumped by his girlfriend, forcing him to move back in with his emotionally unstable mother. Convinced his skills as a rapper are his only real hope at a better life, he makes music with a group of underground artists. But as a white rapper, Rabbit struggles to be taken seriously in a predominantly black musical tradition. (cc)

programme.title: Drumline
programme.desc: An overly-confident drummer joins his college's marching band. The band, which puts musical tradition over entertainment, has little patience for his hubris, and he must learn to be a part of the team or risk being left out on the field. As he clashes with his band director and section leader, he finds time to romance the captain of the dance team

programme.title: Stomp the Yard
programme.desc: An L.A. step-dancer tries to fit in at an Atlanta college and gain acceptance from a fraternity

programme.title: Boyz N the Hood
programme.desc: The tale of three teens growing up in a tough L.A. neighborhood: one lives for sports; another for crime; and the last learns from his father about strength of character and being responsible

programme.title: Poetic Justice
programme.desc: A beautician, whose boyfriend has been killed, escapes her pain by writing poetry. As she travels to a beauty convention, she winds up hitching a ride with an incorrigible postman

programme.title: Love & Basketball
programme.desc: A look at the rocky romance between two young friends, the son of an NBA player and the tomboyish girl next door, who grow up together over the span of 15 years and become basketball stars

programme.title: Just Wright
programme.desc: A tough-talking physical therapist named Leslie Wright (Queen Latifah) is hired to rehab an injured NBA star, whose fiancée leaves him when it looks like his career is over. Eventually, Leslie finds herself falling for the athlete and she discovers the feeling may be mutual. But after his rehab is complete, his fiancée returns to reclaim her man. Directed by Sanaa Hamri. (repeat)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV

programme.title: #NaŚwiętaRazem - koncert kolęd
programme.desc: Najpopularniejsze gwiazdy show-biznesu spotkały się, aby razem z widzami spędzić święta. Przy tradycyjnych, polskich, wigilijnych potrawach ulubieńcy publiczności - gwiazdy sportu, ekranu, filmu i muzyki - porozmawiają o tym, jak spędzają święta ze swoimi rodzinami, jak wygląda w ich domach Wigilia. Opowiedzą też o prezentach i o tym, jak ważne są gesty pomocy i przyjaźni. Wszystko we wspaniałej rodzinnej atmosferze, przy kolędach i anegdotach i życzeniach. Ambasadorem koncertu jest Stowarzyszenie Wiosna, które od 2009 roku w ramach ogólnopolskiej akcji Szlachetna Paczka pomaga rodzinom znajdującym się w trudnej sytuacji materialnej. Podczas koncertu wykonane zostaną najpiękniejsze polskie kolędy, a uświetnią go występy m.in..: Margaret, Sound'n'Grace, Jula, Dawid Kwiatkowski, Red Lips Power Play, After Party i Czadoman

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Bywanie na dywanie
programme.desc: Paulina Koziejowska i Aleksandra Kot zagłębiają się w świat przemysłu rozrywkowego. Opowiadają o bieżących wydarzeniach z show-biznesu, najświeższych plotkach oraz najgłośniejszych skandalach. Stałymi gośćmi programu są Adrian Nychnerewicz, redaktor "Super Expressu", który podzieli się najnowszymi wieściami z czerwonego dywanu, oraz Michał Kozłowski z Nowa TV, który zdradzi sekrety gwiazd sportu. Widzowie znają już obie gospodynie programu jako prezenterki prognozy pogody na Nowej TV, oprócz tego Aleksandra Kot od kilku lat jest związana ze stacją Eska TV

programme.title: #NaŚwiętaRazem - koncert kolęd
programme.desc: Najpopularniejsze gwiazdy show-biznesu spotkały się, aby razem z widzami spędzić święta. Przy tradycyjnych, polskich, wigilijnych potrawach ulubieńcy publiczności - gwiazdy sportu, ekranu, filmu i muzyki - porozmawiają o tym, jak spędzają święta ze swoimi rodzinami, jak wygląda w ich domach Wigilia. Opowiedzą też o prezentach i o tym, jak ważne są gesty pomocy i przyjaźni. Wszystko we wspaniałej rodzinnej atmosferze, przy kolędach i anegdotach i życzeniach. Ambasadorem koncertu jest Stowarzyszenie Wiosna, które od 2009 roku w ramach ogólnopolskiej akcji Szlachetna Paczka pomaga rodzinom znajdującym się w trudnej sytuacji materialnej. Podczas koncertu wykonane zostaną najpiękniejsze polskie kolędy, a uświetnią go występy m.in..: Margaret, Sound'n'Grace, Jula, Dawid Kwiatkowski, Red Lips Power Play, After Party i Czadoman

programme.title: Albert
programme.desc: Of all the trees at Earth Mama's nursery, little Douglas fir tree Albert has the biggest ambition. He hopes to one day be the star of the show as the Christmas tree sitting at the heart of Empire City. As the festive season approaches, Albert set his mind to helping all the other plants at the nursery into the Christmas spirit. However, when a city-wide news bulletin announces the search for this year's tree, Albert spots a chance to live his dream, and sets out on a journey with help from his friends Maisie, a persistently positive palm tree, and Gene, a blisteringly honest weed. Festive animated adventure, with the voices of Bobby Moynihan, Sasheer Zamata and Judah Friedlander

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.sub-title: School of Rockers/How to Impress Ladies.
programme.desc: Double bill. Spencer fears he is going to bomb at the school talent show, but when Billy gets mixed into a batch of Jane's brownies, Spencer has bigger problems. Then, Spencer is nominated for an award, but is only allowed to take one guest to the ceremony

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Dad and Millie play with Dad's collection of vintage board games. Then, Coop is chosen to be the Weiner Water Keeper

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: Amazing Feet of Strength/Me Coop, You Kat.
programme.desc: Double bill. Kat enhances Coop's soccer shoes with alien technology so he can run faster and jump higher. Then, Kat uses his `devolution ray' to dumb Coop down

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Forced to share a lunch table with the outcast group Der Monster Klub, Randy and Howard realise these oddballs are playing a dangerous game that could destroy the whole school. Then, during the premiere of a new 6D film, the movie's title character comes to life and threatens to destroy Norrisville, so Randy is called upon to save the day

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Escape from Detention Island/Bash Johnson: 11th Grade Ninja.
programme.desc: Double bill. Andy accidentally gets Howard detention on an island, so feels obliged to rescue him. Then, Randy learns to let the other kids fight their own battles

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. The mayor takes Shelby's favourite TV show off the air. Then, Boyster wants to bake a cake and calls on Rafik's granny, Petula, to help

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb
programme.desc: The boys invent a machine that convinces Candace she is turning into a vampire. Guest starring Michael J Fox and True Blood stars Anna Paquin and Stephen Moyer

programme.title: Hulk and the Agents of Smash
programme.desc: A-Bomb is eager to prove himself to an over-protective Hulk. When Sauron and his army of dinosaurs begin to flood Earth with lava, A-Bomb finds himself facing a true trial by fire

programme.desc: When a mysterious new villain named Nighthawk uses the individualised counter measures Falcon created to take out the Avengers one by one, he must figure out a way to save his team

programme.title: Marvel's Guardians of the Galaxy
programme.desc: Get to know the characters who make up the newly formed Guardians of the Galaxy - five very different heroes: Star-Lord, Rocket Raccoon, Groot, Drax and Gamora

programme.desc: The explosive final battle for the Kyber Saber comes down to Rowan versus Naare versus the Emperor

programme.title: Mech-X4
